# of complaints regarding missing enviromental documentaion
Description: The number of products released without proper enviromental documentation as a percent of total products released

Name: # of recordkeeping related NOVs
Description: The number of recordkeeping related regulatory violations received per year

Name: % correct material documentation
Description: The percent of total shipments that include the correct environmental documentation

Related: sD3.8 Receive Product from Source or Make

Name: % Error-free Returns Shipped
Description: % Error-free Returns Shipped

Name: % Identified MRO Products Returned To Service
Description: % Identified MRO Products Returned To Service

Name: % Item Location Accuracy
Description: % Item Location Accuracy

Name: % of Excess Product Returns Delivered Complete to the Designated Return Center
Description: Correct destination, according to the schedule, with the correct part and documentation

Name: % of Faultless Invoices
Description: The number of invoices processed without issues and or errors divided by the total number of invoices. Examples of potential invoice defects are: Change from customer purchase order without proper customer involvement Wrong Customer Information (e.g., name, address, telephone number) Wrong Product Information (e.g., part number, product description) Wrong Price (e.g., discounts not applied) Wrong Quantity or Wrong Terms or Wrong Date

Name: % of Faultless Installations
Description: Number of Faultless Installations divided by Total Number of Units Installed.

Name: % of MRO returns delivered to the correct service provider location
Description: % of MRO returns delivered to the correct service provider location, within schedule, with the correct part and documentation

Name: % of products meeting specified environmental performance requirements
Description: The number of products that meet desired environmental performance specifications as a per cent of total products produced

Name: % of products with proper environmental labeling (if required)
Description: The number of products with proper environmental labels in place as a per cent of total products produced
Related: sM2.6 Release Finished Product to Deliver

Name: % of suppliers meeting environmental metrics/criteria
Description: Number of suppliers that completely meet agreement environmental criteria divided by the total number of suppliers used.
Related: sD1.7 Select Carriers and Rate Shipments
sD2.7 Select Carriers and Rate Shipments

Name: % of suppliers with an EMS or ISO 14001 certification
Description: Percent of suppliers used that have a validated Environmental Management System or ISO 14000 certification
Related: sS3.2 Select Final Supplier and Negotiate

Name: % Orders/ Lines Processed Complete
Description: The number of orders / lines that are processed complete divided by the total orders / lines processed within the measurement period

Name: % Orders/ Lines Received Defect Free
Description: The number of orders / lines that are received defect free divided by the total orders / lines processed in the measurement period.

Name: % Orders/ Lines Received On-Time to Demand Requirement
Description: The number of orders / lines that are received on- time to the demand requirements divided by the total orders / lines for the demand requirements in the measurement period

Name: % Orders/ lines received with correct content
Description: Percent of orders or lines received that have the correct material content as specified in the product design specs and supplier agreements.

Name: % Orders/ lines received with correct packaging
Description: Percent of orders or lines received that are packaged correctly with the right type and quantity of packaging material.

Name: % Orders/ Lines Received with Correct Shipping Documents
Description: The number of orders / lines that are received on- time with correct shipping documents divided by the total orders / lines processed in the measurement period

Name: % Orders/lines received damage free
Description: The number of orders / lines that are processed damage free divided by the total orders / lines processed in the measurement period

Name: % Product Transferred On-Time to Demand Requirement
Description: The number of product orders / lines that are transferred on-time to demand requirements divided by the total orders / lines transferred in the measurement period

Name: % Product Transferred without Transaction Errors
Description: The number of transactions processed without error divided by the total transactions processed in the measurement period.

Name: % Schedules Changed within Supplier's Lead Time
Description: The number of schedules that are changed within the suppliers lead-time divided by the total number of schedules generated within the measurement period

Name: % Shipping Schedules that Support Customer Required Return by Date
Description: % Shipping Schedules that Support Customer Required Return by Date

Name: Compliance Documentation
Description: Accuracy Percentage of compliance documentations are complete, correct, and readily available when and how expected by customer, Government and other supply chain regulatory entities. Compliance documentation includes material safety data sheets.

Related: sD1.11 Load Vehicle and Generate Shipping Documents

Name: Customer Commit Date Achievement Time Customer Receiving
Description: Percentage of orders which is received on time as defined by the customer

Name: Fill Rate
Description: The percentage of ship-from-stock orders shipped within 24 hours of order receipt. For services, this metric is the proportion for services that are filled so that the service is completed within 24 hours
Related: sP1.3 Balance Supply Chain Resources with SC Requirements
sD1.3 Reserve Inventory and Determine Delivery Date

Name: Forecast Accuracy
Description: Forecast accuracy is calculated for products and/or families for markets/distribution channels, in unit measurement. Common calculation (Sum Actuals - Sum of Variance) / Sum Actuals to determine percentage error. *monitoring the delta of Forecast Accuracy over measured time periods can determine success rates.
Related: sP1.1 Identify, Prioritize and Aggregate Supply Chain Requirements

Name: Number of occurrences of incorrect designated return center
Description: Number of occurrences of incorrect designated return center

Name: Number of occurrences where excessive inventory is returned and followed
Description: Number of occurrences where excessive inventory is returned and followed

Name: Orders Delivered Damage Free Conformance
Description: Percentage of orders which is delivered without damage.
Related: sD1.13 Receive and verify Product by Customer
sD2.13 Receive and verify Product by Customer
sD3.13 Receive and verify Product by Customer

Name: Orders Delivered Defect Free Conformance
Description: Percentage of orders which is delivered without defect
Related: sD1.13 Receive and verify Product by Customer

Name: Other Required Documentation Accuracy
Description: Percentage of other required documentations (besides of compliance documentation, payment documentation and shipping documentation) are complete, correct, and readily available when and how expected by customer, Government and other supply chain regulatory entities. This kind of documentations includes quality certification
Related: sD2.11 Load Product & Generate Shipping Docs
sD3.11 Load Product & Generate Shipping Docs

Name: Payment Documentation Accuracy
Description: Percentage of payment documentations are complete, correct, and readily available when and how expected by customer, Government and other supply chain regulatory entities. Payment documentations includes invoice, contractual outline agreement
Related: sD1.11 Load Vehicle and Generate Shipping Documents
sD2.11 Load Product & Generate Shipping Docs
sD3.11 Load Product & Generate Shipping Docs

Name: Schedule Achievement
Description: The percentage of time that a plant achieves its production schedule. This calculation is based on the number of scheduled end-items or total volume for a specific period. Note: over-shipments do not make up for under-shipments.

Name: Shipping Documentation Accuracy
Description: Percentage of shipping documentations are complete, correct, and readily available when and how expected by customer, Government and other supply chain regulatory entities. Shipping documentations includes packing slips (customers), bill of lading (carriers) and government or customs documentation/forms
Related: sD1.11 Load Vehicle and Generate Shipping Documents
sD2.11 Load Product & Generate Shipping Docs
sD3.11 Load Product & Generate Shipping Docs

Name: Warranty and Returns
Description: Number of returns within the warranty period. Warranty is a commitment, either expressed or implied that a certain fact regarding the subject matter of a contract is presently true or will be true.

Name: Warranty Costs
Description: Warranty costs include materials, labor and problem diagnosis for product defects.

Name: Waste Processing Errors
Description: Number of errors in waste transactions as a percent of total waste transactions

Name: Yield
Description: The ratio of usable output from a process to its input.

Name: Yield Variability
Description: The condition that occurs when the output of a process is not consistently repeatable either in quantity, quality, or combination of these.

Assess Delivery Performance Cycle Time
Description: The average time associated with assessing the performance of deliver processes.

Name: Assess Supplier Performance Cycle Time
Description: The average time associated with assessing the performance of supplier processes.

Name: Asset Turns
Description: Total gross product revenue/Total net assets

Name: Authorize Defective Product Return Cycle Time
Description: The average time associated with authorizing the return of defective product.

Name: Authorize Excess Product Return Cycle Time
Description: The average time associated with authorizing the return of excess product.

Name: Authorize MRO Product Return Cycle Time
Description: The average time associated with authorizing the return of MRO product.

Name: Authorize Supplier Payment Cycle Time
Description: The average time associated with authorizing payment to suppliers.

Name: Average Days per Engineering Change
Description: # of days each engineering change impacts the delivery date divided by the total # of changes.

Name: Average Days per Schedule Change
Description: # of days each schedule change impacts the delivery date divided by the total # of changes.

Name: Average Release Cycle of Changes
Description: Cycle time for implementing change notices divided by total number of changes.

Name: Balance Product Resources with Product Requirements Cycle Time
Description: The average time associated with balancing product resources and product requirements.

Name: Balance Production Resources with Production Requirements Cycle Time
Description: The average time associated with the identifying, prioritizing, and aggregating product requirements.

Name: Balance Return Resources with Return Requirements Cycle Time
Description: The average time associated with balancing return resources and return requirements.

Name: Balance Supply Chain Resources with Supply Chain Requirements Cycle Time
Description: The average time associated with balancing supply chain resources and supply chain requirements.
Related: sP1.3 Balance Supply Chain Resources with SC Requirements

Name: Build Loads Cycle Time
Description: The average time associated with building shipment loads.

Name: Checkout Cycle Time
Description: The average time required for customer checkout.

Name: Consolidate Orders Cycle Time
Description: The average time required for customer order consolidation.

Name: Current customer return order cycle time
Description: Current return order cycle time, including customer return order processing cycle time, transit time, return processing and disposition cycle time, etc.

Name: Current logistics order cycle time
Description: Current logistics order cycle time, including customer order processing cycle time, dock-to- stock cycle time, pick-to-ship cycle, transit time, etc.

Name: Current manufacturing order cycle time
Description: Current manufacturing cycle time

Name: Current supplier return order cycle time
Description: Current supplier return order cycle time, including supplier return order processing cycle time, pick- toship cycle time, transit time etc.

Name: Deliver and/or Install Cycle Time
Description: The average time required to deliver and install product.

Name: Enter Order, Commit Resources & Launch Program Cycle Time
Description: The average time associated with entering an order, committing resources and program launch

Name: Establish and Communicate Return Plans Cycle Time
Description: The average time associated with establishing and communicating return plans

Description: The average time associated with establishing and communicating deliver plans

Description: The average time associated with establishing and communicating production plans

Description: The average time associated with establishing and communicating source plans

Name: Establish Supply Chain Plans Cycle Time
Description: Five point annual average of the sum of all gross inventories (raw materials & WIP, plant FG, field FG, field samples, other) I (COGS I 365). Total gross value of inventory at standard cost before reserves for excess and obsolescence. Only includes inventory on company books, future liabilities should not be included.
Related: sP1.4 Establish and Communicate Supply Chain Plans

Description: The average time associated with 'filling the shopping cart'

Description: The average time associated with the generating a stocking schedule

Description: The average time associated with obtaining and responding to RFQs/RFPs

Name: Order Fulfillment Dwell Time
Description: Any lead time during the order fulfillment process where no activity takes place, which is imposed by customer requirements. Note that this dwell time is different from idle time or non-value-add lead time, which is caused by inefficiencies in the organization’s processes and therefore ultimately under responsibility of the organization. This kind of idle time should not be deducted from Order Fulfillment Cycle Time.
Related: sD1.2 Receive, Enter, and Validate Order

Description: The average time associated with scheduling the receipt of the return of defective product

Description: The average time associated transfer until product is moved to the next process.

Description: The average time associated transfer until product is moved to the next process.

Description: The average time associated transfer until product is moved to the next process.

Description: Percent of labor used in logistics, not used in direct activity

Description: Percent of labor used in manufacturing, not used in direct activity

Name: Additional deliver return volume
Description: Additional customer return volume

Name: Additional Delivery volume
Description: Additional delivery volume

Name: Additional source volumes obtained in 30 days
Description: Additional source volume to be determined given ramped up resources

Name: Current Deliver Return Volume
Description: Current return volume, number of orders returned

Name: Current Delivery Volume
Description: Number of orders shipped

Name: Current Make Volume
Description: Amount of each item which are manufactured

Name: Current Purchase Order Cycle Times
Description: Sum of time to place a purchase order and supplier lead time

Name: Current source return volume
Description: Current return volume, number of orders returned

Name: Current Source Volume
Description: Amount of each item which are purchased

Name: Customer return order cycle time reestablished and sustained in 30 days
Description: Customer return order cycle time reestablished and sustained for increased quantities returned from customer given 30 days, including customer return order processing cycle time, transit time, return processing and disposition cycle time, etc.

Name: Demand sourcing-supplier constraints
Description: Percentage of orders with on time and accurate documentation supporting the order, including packing slips, bills of lading, invoices, etc. [Total number of orders delivered with correct and timely documentation] / [Total number of orders delivered] x 100%

Name: Mitigation Cost (Cost to mitigate supply chain)
Convergence of SCOR with Lean and Six Sigma
Direct Material Cost (Does not include data from COGS)
Indirect Cost Related to Production (Does not include data from COGS)
Direct Labor Cost (Does not include data from COGS)
Supply Chain Risk Management Strategy Implementation and Analysis
Cost to Plan Supply Chain
Description: The sum of the costs associated with planning supply chain activities

Name: Cost to Plan Source
Description: The sum of the costs associated with planning Source activities

Name: Cost to Plan Make
Description: The sum of the costs associated with planning the making of product

Name: Cost to Plan Deliver
Description: The sum of the costs associated with planning the delivery of product

Name: Cost to Plan Return
Description: The sum of the costs associated with planning the returning of product

Name: Cost to Authorize Supplier Payment
Description: The sum of the costs associated with authorizing supplier payment
Related: sS1.5; sS2.5, sS3.7: Authorize Supplier Payment

Name: Cost to Receive Product
Description: The sum of the costs associated with receiving product

Name: Cost to Schedule Product Deliveries
Description: The sum of the costs associated with scheduling product deliveries
Related: sS1.1; sS2.1; sS3.3: Schedule Product Deliveries

Name: Cost to Transfer Product
Description: The sum of the costs associated with transferring product to Make or Deliver processes

Name: Cost to Verify Product
Description: The sum of the costs associated with raw material verification

Name: Direct Material Cost
Description: Direct cost spent on material for production (Does not include COGS)

Name: Indirect Cost Related to Production
Description: Indirect costs incurred in production indirectly (Does not include COGS)

Name: Direct Labor Cost
Description: Direct cost spent on production labor (Does not include COGS)

Name: Order Management Costs
Description: The aggregation of the following cost elements: (contained in this glossary)
Related: sD1: Deliver Stocked Products; sD3: Deliver Engineer-to- Order Products

Name: Order Delivery and / or Install Costs
Description: The sum of the costs associated with deliver and / or install

Name: Cost to Source Return
Description: The sum of the costs associated with Source Return
Related: sSR1: Source Return Defective Product; sSR3 Source Return Excess Product

Name: Cost to Deliver Return
Description: Cost to Return From Customer (DRx) = Authorization Costs + Schedule Return Costs + Receive Costs + Authorize MRO Return Costs + Schedule MRO Return Costs + Receive MRO Return Costs + Transfer MRO Product Costs + etc.
Related: sDR1: Deliver Return Defective Product; sDR2: Deliver Return MRO Product

Name: Risk Mitigation Costs (Plan)
Description: The total supply chain risk mitigation cost of all PLAN mitigation actions for a specific area, supplier, product, etc. ($)
Related: sEP.9: Manage Supply Chain Plan Risk

Name: Risk Mitigation Costs (Source)
Description: The total supply chain risk mitigation cost of all PLAN mitigation actions for a specific area, supplier, product, etc. ($)
Related: sES.9 Manage Supply Chain Source Risk

Name: Risk Mitigation Costs (Make)
Description: The total supply chain risk mitigation cost of all MAKE mitigation actions for a specific area, supplier, product, etc. ($)
Related: sEM.9: Manage Supply Chain Make Risk

Name: Risk Mitigation Costs (Deliver)
Description: The total supply chain risk mitigation cost of all DELIVER mitigation actions for a specific area, supplier, product, etc. ($)
Related: sED.9: Manage upply Chain Deliver Risk

Name: Risk Mitigation Costs (Return)
Description: The total supply chain risk mitigation cost of all RETURN mitigation actions for a specific area, supplier, product, etc. ($)
Related: sER.9: Manage Supply Chain Return Risk

% of the product content that has a supplier take- back program for recycling or reuse.
% of materials that are recyclable/reusable
Description: % of the product content that is recyclable or reusable

Name: % of packaging/shipping materials reused internally
Description: The percent of scrap from packaging that is immediately reused in the packaging process

Name: % of production materials reused
Description: The percent of scrap from production that is immediately reused in the production process

Name: % of products consisting of previously used components
Description: The weight of recycled material in the product as a percent of total product weight

Name: Average age of Excess Inventory
Description: Average age of Excess Inventory in days

Name: Capacity Utilization
Description: A measure of how intensively a resource is being used to produce a good or service. Some factors that should be considered are internal manufacturing capacity, constraining processes, direct labor availability and key components/ materials availability.

Related: sE4 Manage Supply Chain Human Resources

Name: Deliver Return Cycle Time
Description: The average time associated with returns.

Name: Hazardous materials used during production process as a % of all materials
Description: The % of material (by weight) issued for production that is classified as hazardous material
